    • Method Detail

      • explode

        private void explode()
        If the bomb exploded, do nothing. Otherwise, move it to the end of the direction, then wait for it to explode @see BombPhantom

      • update

        public void update​(double ticksPassed)
        Update every 1/60 second. Try to move. Move fail = stuck -> explode.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Updatable
        Parameters:
        ticksPassed - Frame rate
